fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- On odd nights, 3 evil players learn a player who the host believes has been playing like they’re evil
- On even nights, 2 good players learn the name of a player who the host believes has been playing the most like town

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You, alongside the people who learn the information, also learn the information the host would give
- The host may choose to tell players affected by your abilities why they learned names, but also they could choose not to if they want
- You can’t die night one, even if for any reason a role would go through this immunity
- This is mechanically a town role in every way except win condition

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: See the good faction lose (may win while dead)
